TITLE: Episode 5 - Legally Addicted to Babies
DESCRIPTION: On a solo mission, Jessie tackles some controversial topics.  she discusses Drug Legalization vs Decriminalization/Addiction and Alabama's heartbeat bill as well as taking listener questions. She brings a unique perspective that stems from her work experience and her religious background but also tries to tie in the voluntary philosophy.
